pullrequest.title: fix warning on 32 bit and flaky test

content.raw:
This didn't fix the test flakiness for me. I looked into it a bit, adding some print statements, and it seems that it was always the joint velocity events that were failing to register. So I looked into the physics, and the parent-child relationship was reversed between `needle` and `base`, which caused the `SetVelocity` call to not work properly.

Please consider merging with the [sim_event_flakes_scpeters](#!/osrf/gazebo/branches/compare/sim_event_flakes_scpeters%0Dsim_event_flakes#diff) branch, since I think it fixes the flakiness.
content.html:
This didn't fix the test flakiness for me. I looked into it a bit, adding some print statements, and it seems that it was always the joint velocity events that were failing to register. So I looked into the physics, and the parent-child relationship was reversed between needle and base, which caused the SetVelocity call to not work properly.

Please consider merging with the sim_event_flakes_scpeters branch, since I think it fixes the flakiness.
